mapper.insert: insert into album_photo (id, albumid, address, upload_time, order_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{albumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, albumid, address, upload_time, order_number from album_photo
